org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight

Class WeightLearningApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseGridSearch, GaussianProcessPrior, Hyperband, VotedPerceptron

    public abstract class WeightLearningApplication
extends Object
implements ModelApplication
    Abstract class for learning the weights of weighted mutableRules from data for a model. All non-abstract children should have a constructor that takes: (List, Database (rv), Database (observed)).

    • Field Detail

      • rvDB

        protected Database rvDB

        protected Database observedDB

        protected TrainingMap trainingMap

      • inference

        protected InferenceApplication inference

      • evaluator

        protected Evaluator evaluator

      • inMPEState

        protected boolean inMPEState
        Flags to track if the current variable configuration is an MPE state. This will get set to true when computeMPEState is called, but besides that it is up to children to set to false when weights are changed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeightLearningApplication

        public WeightLearningApplication(List<Rule> rules,
                                 Database rvDB,
                                 Database observedDB)

    • Method Detail

      • learn

        public void learn()
        Learns new weights. The RandomVariableAtoms in the distribution are those persisted in the random variable Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.

      • doLearn

        protected abstract void doLearn()
        Do the actual learning procedure.

      • setBudget

        public void setBudget(double budget)
        Set a budget (give as a proportion of the max budget). Child implementations should make sure to override this and call up the super chain.

      • getInferenceApplication

        public InferenceApplication getInferenceApplication()

      • initGroundModel

        protected void initGroundModel()
        Initialize all the infrastructure dealing with the ground model. Children should favor overriding postInitGroundModel() instead of this.

      • initGroundModel

        public void initGroundModel(InferenceApplication inference,
                            TrainingMap trainingMap)
        Pass in all the ground model infrastructure. The caller should be careful calling this method instead of the other variants. Children should favor overriding postInitGroundModel() instead of this.

      • postInitGroundModel

        protected void postInitGroundModel()
        A convenient place for children to do additional ground model initialization.

      • computeMPEState

        protected void computeMPEState()
        Run inference. Note that atoms will not be committed to the database until weight learning is closed. A explicit call can be made to the inference application to override this functionality.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: ModelApplication
        Releases all resources used by this ModelApplication.
        Specified by:
        close in interface ModelApplication

      • getWLA

        public static WeightLearningApplication getWLA(String name,
                                               List<Rule> rules,
                                               Database randomVariableDatabase,
                                               Database observedTruthDatabase)
        Construct a weight learning application given the data. Look for a constructor like: (List, Database (rv), Database (observed)).
